docs.title: Knowledge Base Platform
docs.text: Welcome to the Knowledge Base Platform. This central repository provides access to documentation across multiple workspaces.

docs.title: Available Workspaces
docs.text:
Use the workspace selector in the navigation bar to switch between the following workspaces:

  • Main - Central documentation and guides
  • Engineering - Engineering team documentation
  • GRC - Governance, Risk, and Compliance documentation
  • Networking - Network infrastructure documentation

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text: Select a workspace from the dropdown menu in the header to navigate to the specific knowledge base you need.
